original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus chos bdag med pa 'di rtogs pa bskyed pas 'jigs pa bsal te bslang bar gsol ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus chos bdag med pa 'di rtogs pa bskyed pas 'jigs pa bsal te bslang bar gsol ba'o //
translated: The phrase Bhagavan, please raise these Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas means that by generating the realization of this selflessness of phenomena through the power of samadhi, the fear is dispelled and they are raised.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba gsan nas bslang bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes pa ste /üîΩnam mkha' ltar mnyam pas nam @25a * //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba gsan nas bslang bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes pa ste / nam mkha' ltar mnyam pas nam @25a * //
translated: Thus, having listened to the request of all the Tathagatas, in order to raise them, he enters into evenness in the samadhi called the nondual vajra that is equal to space.

original: mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: Equal to space, it is equal to space.

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The reality of the non-substantiality of all things

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni gnyis su med pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni gnyis su med pa ste /
translated: is the non-duality equal to space.

original: de la dmigs pas na ming de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de la dmigs pas na ming de skad ces bya ste /
translated: It is called by that name because it is the objective support.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gnyis su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The one who has entered into the meditative concentration called the non-dual vajra equal to space is the Bhagavat Great Vajradhara.

original: de nas rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nas rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Then, they sat down on their respective seats.

original: de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyis reg pas bdag med par rtogs te /
analyzed: de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyis reg pas bdag med par rtogs te /
translated: By the Bhagavat's light touching them, they realized selflessness.

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral bas ni de thams cad 'jigs shing skrag pa dang bral bas so //
analyzed: bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral bas ni de thams cad 'jigs shing skrag pa dang bral bas so //
translated: Since they were free from the grasping of self, they were all free from fear and terror.

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'gro ba'i don mthong bas so //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'gro ba'i don mthong bas so //
translated: They were amazed by the power of the Bhagavat's meditative concentration, seeing the benefit for transmigrators.

original: ae ma'o chos /
analyzed: ae ma'o chos /
translated: Emaho! Dharma!

original: ae ma'i chos zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu la shin tu yang ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma'i chos zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu la shin tu yang ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa'o //
translated: The exclamation Amazing! is spoken in great wonder at the power of the Lord's meditative concentration.

original: ae ma'o chos kyi don byung ba //
analyzed: ae ma'o chos kyi don byung ba //
translated: Amazing! The meaning of Dharma has arisen!

original: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi mthus ngo mtshar gyi rang bzhin gyi don du gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas pa'i ngo bo ste de byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi mthus ngo mtshar gyi rang bzhin gyi don du gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas pa'i ngo bo ste de byung ba ni skyes pa'o //
translated: The meaning of Dharma is the essence of the arising of the spirit of enlightenment in the mental continuum of disciples by the power of that very meditative concentration, which has the nature of wonder.

original: chos don dag pa zhes pa la phung po la sogs pa ni chos so //
analyzed: chos don dag pa zhes pa la phung po la sogs pa ni chos so //
translated: The meaning of pure Dharma is that the aggregates and so on are the Dharma.

original: dag pa'i don ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes so //üîΩde nyid bdag med pa ste ;
analyzed: dag pa'i don ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes so // de nyid bdag med pa ste ;
translated: The meaning of pure is the pristine wisdom of the pure reality that is pure by nature.

original: bdag med pa'i rdo rje de nyid kyis rigs thams cad kyi rigs thams cad kyi rgyal por gyur cing bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na rdo rje rgyal po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bdag med pa'i rdo rje de nyid kyis rigs thams cad kyi rigs thams cad kyi rgyal por gyur cing bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na rdo rje rgyal po zhes bya ste /
translated: That very [pristine wisdom] is selflessness, and the vajra of selflessness is the king of all the clans, since it is the clan of all the clans. It is called vajra king because it overwhelms all demons.

original: 'dis ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni mi bskyod pa'i ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is said to be the essence of Akshobhya.üîΩPure body, speech, and mind

original: sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag / ces bya ba ni sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag / ces bya ba ni sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: is so called because of the purity of body, speech, and mind.

original: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa nyid //
translated: It is the same as space.

original: ces bya ba ni de bzhin nyid dang / de nyid gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de bzhin nyid dang / de nyid gnas su gyur pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is so called because of the suchness and the state of that very thing.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pas na rnam par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pas na rnam par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is changeless because of the absence of all conceptualization.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi yin pa'i phyir snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi yin pa'i phyir snang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is non-apparent because of the nature of the realm of totality.

original: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: Homage and praise to the vajra body.

original: ces bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sku rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is said to be the essence of the vajra body.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ni dus gsum po de nyid lam ste /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ni dus gsum po de nyid lam ste /
translated: The three times are the past, future, and present.

original: de la 'jug pa'i ngang tshul gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i ngang tshul gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The nature of engaging in those is

original: dus gsum dag gis lam du 'byung //
analyzed: dus gsum dag gis lam du 'byung //
translated: the arising in the path of the three times.

original: zhes bya ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: Thus he is the Tathagata.

original: de'i thugs ni rdo rje @25b 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: de'i thugs ni rdo rje @25b 'chang chen po'o //
translated: His mind is the Great Vajradhara.

original: dbyings gyur pa zhes pa'ang de nyid kyi rigs thams cad byang chub kyi sems nyid la skye ste /
analyzed: dbyings gyur pa zhes pa'ang de nyid kyi rigs thams cad byang chub kyi sems nyid la skye ste /
translated: The transformation of the realm is that all the families are born from the very nature of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it is the nature of the beginningless and endless Dharmadhatu.

original: nam mkha' ltar thams cad du song bas na nam mkha' chen po'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar thams cad du song bas na nam mkha' chen po'o //
translated: Since it pervades everywhere like space, it is the Great Space.

original: nam mkha' ltar dus gsum med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i lam ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar dus gsum med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i lam ste /
translated: That which is the nature of the three times without space is the path of space.

original: 'dis ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is said to be the nature of the Great Vajradhara.

original: nam mkha'i sku zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i sku zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The body of space is the wisdom of equality.

original: nam mkha' las kyang byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' las kyang byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
translated: It is born from space.

original: 'dis ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is said to be the nature of the Cintaniamani family.

original: nam mkha'i gsung gi lam ston pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gsung gi lam ston pa //
translated: The path of the speech of space is taught.

original: zhes bya ba ni tshig dang tshig ma yin pa'i sgra thams cad ni brag ca lta bu ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tshig dang tshig ma yin pa'i sgra thams cad ni brag ca lta bu ste /
translated: All sounds, whether words or not, are like echoes.üîΩ

original: 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the nature of the family of desire, which is said to be all sounds, words and non-words, like an echo.üîΩThe mind of space is the supreme Dharma,

original: nam mkha'i thugs ni chos kyi chog / ces bya ba ni sems nam mkha' ltar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i ngo bor gyur pa gang yin pa ded ni nam mkha'i thugs te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i thugs ni chos kyi chog / ces bya ba ni sems nam mkha' ltar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i ngo bor gyur pa gang yin pa ded ni nam mkha'i thugs te /
translated: the mind which is like space, the nature of liberation, which has become the essence of the naturally radiant clear light.

original: de nyid chos kyi mchog ste dam pa de la spyod cing gnas pa gan yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi mchog ste dam pa de la spyod cing gnas pa gan yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who practices and abides in that supreme, that is, best, Dharma is said to be so.

original: 'dis ni dam tshig gi rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni dam tshig gi rigs kyi ngo bor gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the nature of the family of commitment, which is said to be the mind of space.

original: kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i spyod pa ni kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'i spyod pa ni kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: Conduct is the performance of all mundane and supramundane feats.

original: de nyid phul du byung ba'i mchog ste de gang du gsungs pa de ni spyod pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid phul du byung ba'i mchog ste de gang du gsungs pa de ni spyod pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya'o //
translated: That is the most excellent of all, and that which is taught there is called the chapter on the most excellent of all practices.

original: le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the fifth chapter.

original: // / bsgom pa'am bzlas pa byed par 'dod pas sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang rjes su mnyes pa'i mchod pa bya dgos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / bsgom pa'am bzlas pa byed par 'dod pas sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang rjes su mnyes pa'i mchod pa bya dgos pa'i phyir /
translated: Because one who wishes to meditate or perform repetition must perform the consecration of body, speech, and mind and the worship of the pleasing,

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u gsungs pa'o //
translated: then, beginning with the words ‚ÄúThen,‚Äù the chapter on the consecration of body, speech, and mind is taught.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba la sku zhes bya ba la sku rdo rje'i ngo bo ni sku'i gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret of the body, speech, and mind of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is the body, and so forth. The body, which is the entity of the vajra of body, is the secret of the body.

analyzed: gsung rdo rje'i ngo bo ni gsung gi gsang ba'o //

original: thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo ni thugs kyi gsang ba ste /
analyzed: thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo ni thugs kyi gsang ba ste /
translated: The mind, which is the entity of the vajra of mind, is the secret of mind.

original: gang sku mdog dang dbyibs dang phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya la sogs pa rnam pa rgya che ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dpag tu med pa gang yin pa 'di ni @26a * //
analyzed: gang sku mdog dang dbyibs dang phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya la sogs pa rnam pa rgya che ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa dpag tu med pa gang yin pa 'di ni @26a * //

original: sku'i gsang bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sku'i gsang bar shes par bya'o //

analyzed: thugs ka'i zla ba la rdo rje bsgom pa ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o //

translated: The visualization of a white five-pronged vajra on the tongue, the recitation of the mantra syllables, and the imagination of their meaning is the secret of speech.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pas de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la ming de skad ces bya ste /

analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i gnas rdo rje //

original: 'bras bu 'dod pas zhes bya ba la 'bras bu 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor 'gro ba rnams bya bar 'dod cing de'i sprul pas nam mkha' gang ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad khyab ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dod pas zhes bya ba la 'bras bu 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor 'gro ba rnams bya bar 'dod cing de'i sprul pas nam mkha' gang ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad khyab ste /

analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bskyed la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i @31b rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa rnams zhi ba'i nyams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ni bsad par 'gyur ba'o //

original: de ltar 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang dag par sbyor ba'i bsgom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang dag par sbyor ba'i bsgom pa bstan nas /

analyzed: de ni nges par gzung ba'i zhi ba'i sems las brtsams te gsungs ba ni de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na zhes bya ba ste de la shes rab kyi ni chos thams cad rang bzhin
translated: How does one cultivate the recollection of the perfection of wisdom pledge?üîΩTherein, wisdom is the study and reflection that realizes the intrinsic luminosity of all phenomena.

original: gyis 'od gsal bar rtogs pa'i thos pa dang bsam pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes rab de'i phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin cing song ba yin te /
analyzed: gyis 'od gsal bar rtogs pa'i thos pa dang bsam pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes rab de'i phun sum tshogs pa pha rol tu phyin cing song ba yin te /

original: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: de nyid ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig go //
translated: Since it is not to be transgressed, it is a pledge.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
translated: Intrinsic luminosity

original: zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad do //
translated: refers to all phenomena, such as the aggregates, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na //üîΩthams cad ma skyes zag pa med //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na // thams cad ma skyes zag pa med //
translated: Why is that?üîΩBecause it says,

analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs pas so //
translated: All are unborn and uncontaminated.

original: tshul de nyid kyis ni don dam par byang chub med cing byang chub khong du chung ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'ang med do //
analyzed: tshul de nyid kyis ni don dam par byang chub med cing byang chub khong du chung ba'i mngon par rtogs pa'ang med do //
translated: By this very method, there is no enlightenment ultimately, and there is no realization of the realization of enlightenment.üîΩAnd there is no element, etc.

analyzed: khams kyang med cing zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste skyed par byed pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nyid kyis na dngos po nyid du 'byung ba'ang med pa'o //

original: thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //

original: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //

analyzed: mtshan ma med cing zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //

original: yang de nyid kyi khyad par ni mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yang de nyid kyi khyad par ni mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /

original: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge dang bral ba'o //

original: nam mkha' bzhin zhes bya ba ni dpe bstan pa'o //üîΩde ltar mi skye ba yin yang gnyis kyi ngo bo yang ma yin la gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo yang ma yin pas na /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin zhes bya ba ni dpe bstan pa'o // de ltar mi skye ba yin yang gnyis kyi ngo bo yang ma yin la gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo yang ma yin pas na /

original: gnyis med gnyi su med min no //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyi su med min no //

original: gzhan yang zhi zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa skye ba thams cad zhi pas na zhi ba'o //

original: zhi ba de nyid kyi dpe bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: zhi ba de nyid kyi dpe bstan pa'i phyir ;

original: de nyid phul du byung bas na mchog ste /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas rin po che'i mchod pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad do //

analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog smos pa yin no //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is the nondual intuition of the Buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo bas na theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo bas na theg pa chen po'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle is so called because it is the essence of the Bodhisattva path with its result.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgoms pas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgoms pas na nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is equal to space because it is cultivated as equal to space.

original: des sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa sbyor bar byed pas @32b na rnam par sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: des sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa sbyor bar byed pas @32b na rnam par sbyong ba'o //

original: kun nas bzang bas na kun du bzang po ste /
analyzed: kun nas bzang bas na kun du bzang po ste /
translated: It is universal good because it is completely good.

original: lha chen po gsum la sogs par sprul pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad par gyur kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyis mi gos pas na kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: lha chen po gsum la sogs par sprul pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad par gyur kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams kyis mi gos pas na kun du bzang po'o //
translated: It is universal good because it is not soiled by attachment, etc. , even though it acts for the sake of sentient beings by emanating as the three great divine bodies, etc.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che //
translated: It is the great passion, great aggression, and great stupidity.

original: zhes bya ba ni rigs te thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rigs te thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: It is the family, the essence of method and insight.

original: rdo rje theg par ston pa //
analyzed: rdo rje theg par ston pa //
translated: It is taught in the Vajra Vehicle.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje theg pa rab tu ston par mdzad pas na 'di skad ces gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje theg pa rab tu ston par mdzad pas na 'di skad ces gsungs pa'o //

original: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni mnyam pa med ba dang tshad med pa gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni mnyam pa med ba dang tshad med pa gnyis kyis so //
translated: Equal to the realm of space means that he is incomparable and immeasurable.

original: de nyid kyis na mchog go //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme one means that he is the best.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni thar ba'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes ni thar ba'o //

original: de thob par byed pa'i shes rab ni thar ba'i lam ste /
analyzed: de thob par byed pa'i shes rab ni thar ba'i lam ste /
translated: The wisdom that causes one to attain that is the path of liberation.

original: de rnams ston pas ni rab ston pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams ston pas ni rab ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher of those means that he teaches them.

original: byang chub rnam pa gsum ni theg pa gsum mo //
analyzed: byang chub rnam pa gsum ni theg pa gsum mo //
translated: The three kinds of enlightenment are the three vehicles.

original: de'i bkod pa ni lam ste /
analyzed: de'i bkod pa ni lam ste /
translated: The array of those means the path.

original: de la gnas pa ni sems can gyi rgyud la ston cing gnas pa'o ;
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni sems can gyi rgyud la ston cing gnas pa'o ;
translated: He is the one who teaches and abides in those means that he teaches and abides in the mindstreams of sentient beings.

original: / sangs rgyas rnams kyi skal pa'i mchog ni sangs rgyas skal mchog ste /
analyzed: / sangs rgyas rnams kyi skal pa'i mchog ni sangs rgyas skal mchog ste /
translated: The supreme good fortune of the buddhas is the supreme good fortune of the buddhas.

original: phul du byung ba'i dngos por grub pa'o //
analyzed: phul du byung ba'i dngos por grub pa'o //
translated: He is the one who is established as the best thing.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pas na dag pa'i bdag go //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pas na dag pa'i bdag go //
translated: He is the pure self means that he is pure in body, speech, and mind.

original: rang gi sems ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni byang chub bo //
analyzed: rang gi sems ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni byang chub bo //
translated: Enlightenment is the thorough knowledge of one's own mind just as it is.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The mind that has that nature is the mind of enlightenment.

original: spyan lnga rnam par rgyas shing yang sa pa gang la mnga' bde ni rgyas pa'i spyan no //
analyzed: spyan lnga rnam par rgyas shing yang sa pa gang la mnga' bde ni rgyas pa'i spyan no //
translated: The eye that has the expansion and increase of the five eyes is the eye of increase.

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ni chos te /
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ni chos te /
translated: The Dharma is the powers, the fearlessnesses, and so forth.

original: de'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i rgyud la spel bar mdzad pa'i don gyis na de nyid ni 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor gdul bya'i rgyud la spel bar mdzad pa'i don gyis na de nyid ni 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is that very [Dharma] in the sense of spreading its circle in the mind-streams of those to be tamed.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par spangs pas dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par spangs pas dag pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The purity is the purification of the traces of the afflictions of body, speech, and mind.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu dag ces bya'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu dag ces bya'o //
translated: That is called the purity of body, speech, and mind.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes nye bar mtshon cing de thob bar byed pa'i theg pa ni rdo rje'i theg pa'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes nye bar mtshon cing de thob bar byed pa'i theg pa ni rdo rje'i theg pa'o //
translated: The vehicle that is characterized by the vajra of body, speech, and mind and that causes the attainment of that [purity] is the vajra vehicle.

original: rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur cing mdzes pa'i don dang ldan pas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur cing mdzes pa'i don dang ldan pas na rgyal po'o //

original: nam mkha' ltar de bzhin du ro gcig pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du khyab pas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar de bzhin du ro gcig pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du khyab pas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
translated: Since it pervades everything with the gnosis of the same taste as space, everything is space.

original: de nyid kyis na 'di ni mi 'gyur mchog ste rtag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na 'di ni mi 'gyur mchog ste rtag pa'o //
translated: And for that very reason, it is the unchanging supreme, the permanent.

original: rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo bas na thams cad dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo bas na thams cad dbang bskur ro //
translated: Since it is the nature of the jewel lineage, it is the consecration of all.

original: rigs thams cad kyi don du gyur pas na kun gyi don te /
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi don du gyur pas na kun gyi don te /
translated: Since it is the meaning of all lineages, it is the meaning of all,

original: @33a * // nam mkha' mdzod kyi gzugs kyis thams cad kyi don du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @33a * // nam mkha' mdzod kyi gzugs kyis thams cad kyi don du gyur pa'i phyir ro //

original: khams gsum ma lus pa'i chos kyi rgyal po mnyes pas na kun dbang ngo //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus pa'i chos kyi rgyal po mnyes pas na kun dbang ngo //
